Class Torus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Primitive
      • Torus

  • public class Torus
extends Primitive
    A Torus and Torus-Knot representation. Creates geometrical data for triangle slice representation in opqnGL changing P or Q above 1 will trigger the Torus-knot code.
    Author:
    Andreas Berger
